Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. It's not just an item; it's a testament to quality and excellence. Considering its exceptional features and the time invested in its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I'm proposing an exclusive deal of $150. This is an opportunity to own something truly special at a price that reflects its true value. I trust this offer will resonate with your appreciation for quality products. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this acquisition. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
